nodes.text: The astrigia were a species of fierce swooping predator with large eyes. They lived in the forests of steepara trees that covered the planet Dressel, and posed a constant threat to the sentient Dressellian species who shared the planet with them.
Astrigia were first mentioned in Stay on Target, a supplement released in 2015 by Fantasy Flight Games in Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
